thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 20 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Liveperson Announces Q4 Loss Per Share Of $0.06

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Liveperson Announces Q4 Loss Per Share Of $0.06
text:
Feb 20 (Reuters) - Liveperson Inc:
* LIVEPERSON ANNOUNCES FOURTH QUARTER 2017 FINANCIAL RESULTS
* Q4 ADJUSTED EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.00 * Q4 LOSS PER SHARE $0.06 * Q4 REVENUE ROSE 2 PERCENT TO $57.4 MILLION * SEES FY 2018 REVENUE $237 MILLION TO $243 MILLION * SEES Q1 GAAP NET LOSS PER SHARE OF $0.13 - $0.11
* SEES Q1 DILUTED ADJUSTED NET INCOME PER SHARE $0.00 - $0.01
* SEES Q1 REVENUE OF $56.75 MILLION - $57.75 MILLION
* SEES 2018 GAAP NET LOSS PER SHARE $0.35 - $0.29
* SEES 2018 DILUTED ADJUSTED NET INCOME PER SHARE OF $0.07 - $0.10
* SEES 2018 CAPITAL EXPENDITURES OF APPROXIMATELY $14.5 MILLION
* Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.01, REVENUE VIEW $56.5 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.01, REVENUE VIEW $55.5 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* FY2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.11, REVENUE VIEW $233.7 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* SELECTS CHRIS GREINER AS CFO Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
